channel.title: Comments on: World’s stupidest hacker appears on IRC
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I can't believe you said that on my blog. I'm promoting you to edior ;-)
item.content:encoded:
I can’t believe you said that on my blog.
I’m promoting you to edior ;-)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen

item.description: amit it you son of a bitch
item.content:encoded: amit it you son of a bitch

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Honestly, baby, it isn't mine. (http://www.mutantreviewers.com/raustin.html - look for "swedish" in the text)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: How did your name get in there? Are you playing with IRC again? :)
item.content:encoded: How did your name get in there? Are you playing with IRC again? :)
